meanings.sent1: The sun reemitted light after the storm passed.
meanings.sent2: The radio tower reemitted the signal for better reception.
meanings.sent3: The firefly reemitted its glow, surprising the curious child.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse reemitted its beam, guiding ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: The mirror reemitted the image with perfect clarity.

meanings.sent1: She reemitted the invitation to make sure everyone received it.
meanings.sent2: The post office reemitted the package that was returned to sender.
meanings.sent3: The teacher reemitted the assignment, causing a wave of relief among the students.
meanings.sent4: The speaker reemitted his message, hoping for a better response this time.
meanings.sent5: The echo reemitted the sound, creating a sense of mystery in the cave.
